titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I attended Mattins; worked at the sermon; cleared up my room with George's assistance; entertained Hadow & Greener at lunch: attended the 2nd meeting of the Committee on "the Church's duty towards social questions", at which Blackett & Greener attended as witnesses: and worked in the garden for 1Â½ hours. In my shirt–slieves [sic] I received Pemberton & Moulsdale.
